caption.p: The cell viability of astrocytes after 24 h treatment with essential oils from Rhaponticum carthamoides hairy roots (HR) and roots of soil-grown plants (SGR). The viability was determined by MTT assay. The values are the mean ± SD of three independent experiments. ∗ p < 0.05 versus control; # p < 0.05 HR essential oil versus SGR essential oil.
